meanings.sent1: The talented filmmakers won an award for their movie.
meanings.sent2: Many filmmakers work together to create a film.
meanings.sent3: The filmmakers decided to make a comedy about a talking dog.
meanings.sent4: The filmmakers painted a beautiful story on the canvas of the screen.
meanings.sent5: The filmmakers captured the essence of love and friendship in their film.

meanings.definition: Those involved in the production of films.
meanings.sent1: The filmmakers collaborated with actors and crew members.
meanings.sent2: Filmmakers handle various aspects of film production.
meanings.sent3: The filmmakers had a pizza party to celebrate completing the shoot.
meanings.sent4: The filmmakers orchestrated a symphony of visuals and sounds.
meanings.sent5: The filmmakers transformed their vision into a cinematic masterpiece.
